<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Drain Emotion](/Feats.aspx?ID=4047) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="All Ancestries" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=467" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 127</row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Fey Influence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1239)

</column>

---

You touch an adjacent creature and attempt to draw out its excess emotion. Attempt a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check against a single [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) or [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effect affecting the touched creature. If you succeed, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level for a number of rounds equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1 round).

**Special** This feat gains the trait appropriate for your ancestry ([human](/Traits.aspx?ID=90) for [human](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=6), [goblin](/Traits.aspx?ID=81) for [goblin](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=4), etc.).
name: Drain Emotion
